column4: the volume up/down buttons on my thinkpad don't seem to generate keypress/release events, just keymapnotify ones (according to xev).  i can map it to a keyboard shortcut (XF86AudioRaiseVolume) in xfce, but it doesn't ever seem to execute the shortcut.  how do i fix this?
then go into gnome and see which key mappings it uses? :)
it's not generating a mapping, it's generating a keynotifyevent
